title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for C ( 4 ) − C ( 2 ) 4 − 2

1 point is earned for the conclusion, using MVT

C is differentiable ⇒ C is continuous (on the closed interval)

C( 4 )−C( 2 )  4−2  =  12.8−8.8 2   =2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaqaaiaadoeapaWaaeWaaeaapeGaaGinaaWdaiaawIcacaGL PaaapeGaeyOeI0Iaam4qa8aadaqadaqaa8qacaaIYaaapaGaayjkai aawMcaa8qacaqGGaaabaGaaGinaiabgkHiTiaaikdacaqGGaaaaiab g2da9iaabccadaWcaaqaaiaaigdacaaIYaGaaiOlaiaaiIdacqGHsi slcaaI4aGaaiOlaiaaiIdaaeaacaaIYaGaaeiiaaaacaqGGaGaeyyp a0JaaGOmaaaa@4CE3@

Therefore, by the Mean Value Theorem, there is at least one time t, 2<t<4, for which C'(t)=2.
